requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              Job Requirement ( Yêu cầu công việc)
              
              •	Graduated from University / College, with specializing in garment industry on priory.
              
              •	At least 2- 3 years’ experience in the same position in garments field
              
              •	Fluent in English
              
              •	Enthusiastic and good communication skills
              
              •	Good skill in Microsoft Office Software
              
              •	Willing to learn and go travel for work.
              
              •	Be able to work under high pressure and work dependently as well as co-cooperate well with colleagues
              

              Qualifications ( Tiêu chuẩn)
              
              •	Fluent in English
              
              •	Enthusiastic and good communication skills
              
              •	Must be motivated to build a long term career in Textiles
              
              •	College degree
              
              •	Comfortable with Microsoft Office
              
              •	Willing to constantly learn and develop yourself
              
              •	Problem solving Attitude
              
              •	Positive attitude and team working
              

              Other information (Các thông tin khác):
              
              •	Category: Full time
              
              •	Working hours: 8 hours per day
              
              •	Opportunities: an active working environment, professional, opportunity for further training
              
              •	Welfare: as per current labor law: annual leave, social insurance, health insurance, unemployment insurance, bonus as per personal performance.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
